alert.note: Alert for Central Laramie Range and Southwest Platte County (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: High Wind Warning issued November 04 at 1:45PM MDT until November 05 at 9:00PM MDT by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 5 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 9 PM MDT SATURDAY... * WHAT...West winds 40 to 50 mph with gusts in excess of 80 mph possible. * WHERE...Central Laramie Range and Southwest Platte County including the Bordeaux area. * WHEN...From 5 PM MDT Friday to 9 PM MDT Saturday. * IMPACTS...Widespread strong crosswinds could create significantly hazardous travel for all motorists on Interstate 25 between mile markers 60 and 80...especially for light weight and high profile vehicles...including light load semis and those towing camper trailers.
info.instruction: People should avoid being outside in forested areas and around trees and branches. If possible, remain in the lower levels of your home during the windstorm, and avoid windows. Use caution if you must drive.

area.areaDesc: Central Laramie Range and Southwest Platte County
